synopsis.text:
Tamotsu Oishi and Gunma Akagi, two best friends from the countryside, share a love for speed and racing. Gunma, the more impulsive of the two, frequently causes trouble with his turbocharged tractor, much to the dismay of his father, an aspiring politician. One fateful night, while racing down the highway, they're overtaken by a mysterious speeding car. Gunma, fueled by the thrill of the chase, attempts to outrun the vehicle but crashes in a blaze of defeat.

This crushing loss ignites a burning desire within Gunma to become the best racer he can be. Leaving behind his peaceful life in the country, he sets off for the bustling city with a single goal in mind: to become a Formula One star. With determination in his heart and the memory of that mysterious car etched into his mind, Gunma embarks on a thrilling journey to make his dreams a reality.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
